search_results.snippet: Yakitori as street food, with salty and sweet sauce. Yakitori (Japanese:  ?, lit. grilled chicken) is a Japanese type of skewered chicken. The preparation of Yakitori involves skewering the meat with kushi (?), a type of skewer typically made of steel, bamboo, or similar materials.
